items.title: Axure RP Pro 7 For Wireframes

visible_instructors.title: Debbie Levitt
visible_instructors.name: Debbie
visible_instructors.job_title: Delta CX author | CX & UX Strategist, Architect, Trainer

items.headline: Using Axure RP Pro software to create annotated wireframes. How to export, publish, and share your wireframes.
objectives_summary: By the end of this course, you will be able to create wireframes in Axure.
You will be able to export your wireframe pages as images or a PDF.
You will be able to publish your wireframes to code you can upload.

items.title: Learn to create interactive eBooks from scratch
items.headline: Creating media rich interactive eBooks using Adobe InDesign cc 2017
objectives_summary: Create media rich interactive eBook using InDesign CC 2017.
Students will learn to create and publish online publications.

items.title: Strengthen Your UX Design Portfolio to Unlock Opportunities
items.headline: Essential Guide for Product/ UX Designers to Build a Strong Portfolio That Gets you Hired
objectives_summary: Create a portfolio that has a solid process and strong projects.
Learn thinking frameworks and strategies that you can apply right away.
Understand how to think about your portfolio holistically and how to use it as a hook to connect with the people you'd like to work with.

items.title: Design Great UX Design Portfolios with Notion (+ Template)
items.headline: Learn how to create stunning portfolios in Notion in no time!
objectives_summary: How to set up the structure of your portfolio
How to make smart decisions when adding your work samples
How to make your Notion portfolio stand out from the rest

items.title: Getting Started with UX design: 3-in-1
items.headline: A fast paced guide in User Experience design
objectives_summary: Learn more about Insights, Wireframes & Prototypes, Deploying and Scaling
Apply user testing and design iteration to ensure a smooth web experience
Understand human-centered observations and know how to engage in UX thinking

items.title: Designing Usable and Effective Business Dashboards
items.headline: A User Experience (UX) Perspective
objectives_summary: You will be able to add "Dashboard Design Expert" in your profile.
You will be able to execute "dashboard design" projects from scratch to delivery.
You will be able to articulate and "ask right questions" to your clients / stakeholders strenthening their confidence in your expertise.

items.title: Typography in UX/UI Design
items.headline: The Complete Designer Guide to Typography Online (+ Figma Typescale File)
objectives_summary: Typefaces & Fonts, and what's the difference?
Serif, Sans Serif & Superfamilies
Where to find typefaces?

items.title: UX Design Mastery - User Experience Design Crash Course
items.headline: Unlock the power of design thinking. Learn the UX design process with practical examples & become UX designer! Start now
objectives_summary: UX is not UI and you will learn to understand the difference and master UX design
You will learn to design products that people want.
UX process - Learn specific methods and know when to use them.

items.title: The User-Centred Design (UCD) Process

visible_instructors.title: David Gollasch
visible_instructors.name: David
visible_instructors.job_title: Computer Scientist and HCI/HRI Research Associate

items.headline: How to Involve Users in User Interface Engineering
objectives_summary: What is User-Centred Design?
Why is User-Centred Design important or beneficial for your project?
How to apply User-Centred Design within your development process?

items.title: Voice UI (VUI) App Prototyping using Adobe XD

visible_instructors.title: Robin Louw
visible_instructors.name: Robin
visible_instructors.job_title: Certified UX Designer and Adobe Creative Educator

items.headline: Jump right into UX (User Experience) design with Adobe XD and create an app prototype with a voice user interface
objectives_summary: Learn what Adobe XD is and how to use it
How to design a high-fidelity calculator app prototype using Adobe XD
How to share your XD prototype with stakeholders and developers

items.title: Gamification

visible_instructors.title: The Art Of Service
visible_instructors.name: The Art Of
visible_instructors.job_title: Quality education for Career Driven IT Professionals

items.headline: An introductory course about understanding the characteristics and elements of gamification and its applications.
objectives_summary: Learn about Gamification and its history
Understand Gamification design concepts
Learn about the benefits and risks of Gamification

items.title: UI / UX Designer - All you need to lean the profession
items.headline: Learn how to design applications by using Adobe Xd. 0 knowledge required!
objectives_summary: Practical Systematic Learning. You will learn design basics, UI design, UX design, User flows, Prototype, Real-life project based on real spec.

items.title: Design Thinking - Creativity as a Method - Crash Course
items.headline: Creative Problem Solving for Better Design of User Experiences, Products, Services and Business Models
objectives_summary: What design thinking is and when to use it.
Apply the design thinking principles to solve problems more creatively.
Understand the Design Thinking process.

items.title: Mobile App Design Process
items.headline: Designing A Product from Scratch
objectives_summary: You will be able to understand the concepts behind mobile design and apply them in your business or career.
You will be able to replicate the design process from the very start of creating a brand logo to visual mockups using industrial tools : Invision and Sketch.
You will be able to conduct and analyse your user research.

items.title: Mobile App Design in Affinity Designer: UX & UI from Scratch
items.headline: Design a Modern, Clean, Real World To-Do App from Scratch and Learn the Fundamentals & Essentials of UX and UI Design.
objectives_summary: Learn how to design a real world mobile application from scratch
Create modern, minimalistic and beautiful UX/UI experiences
Grasp the fundamentals of UX and UI design and how to apply them into your projects

items.title: Sketch 3 - Mobile App Design (UI & UX Design)
items.headline: The Beginners Guide To Designing Mobile Apps with Sketch 3. No experience needed- Design Mobile Apps from scratch!
objectives_summary: Design Your Own Mobile Apps from Scratch
Build A Working Mobile App Prototype that you can show to everyone!
Learn the basic mechanics of Sketch 3
